welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Meulebeke, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, taste our delicious cuisine, and experience all that our beloved city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Kortrijk Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and budget airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
